About CLUSTER DIGITAL ATHLETE COMMUNITY RESOURCES

WE ARE NOT SPECTATORS

PROMOTING IRELAND AS A WORLD LEADING DESTINATION FOR SPORTS INNOVATION AND TECHNOLOGY

Find out more Contact us

What we do

Offering bespoke and tailored programs for SportsTech companies at all stages of development.

Find out more

Start

By supporting startups with access to experienced mentors, and by connecting them with essential resources to help validate and grow, we are helping to build an ecosystem that can allow the portstech industry to thrive in Ireland.

Grow

We work with later state companies to enable them to identify, develop and execute effective go-to market strategies. Through engagement with investors, stakeholders, organisations and teams, we empower sportstech organisations to grow.

Take-Off

We help established companies that want to move to the next level. By identifying pain points and matching participants with relevant expertise from our international panel of industry experts, we engage the sportstech network to help companies takeoff.

Landing Zone

We work with overseas companies looking to locate in a sportstech cluster. We provide office space for your initial landing, connections into industry, academia, funding agencies, professional services and the sporting community in Limerick.
